title: Refund Policy
content: Customers can request a refund within 30 days of purchase if they provide a receipt. Digital goods are non-refundable after download.

title: Shipping Times
content: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days in the US. International shipping takes 7-14 business days.

title: Support Hours
content: Customer support is available Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM Eastern Time.

title: Account Security
content: Users should enable multi-factor authentication and use a unique password to protect their account.

title: Subscription Cancellation
content: You can cancel your subscription any time from the billing page. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing cycle.
